DOC.brief_summary: Insomnia common clinical disease.The serious patient could sleep night , often accompany headache , dizziness , forgetfulness . All increase mental burden insomnia patient seriously affect normal work quality life patient . Modern medical treatment treat insomnia use sedative hypnotic drug , mainly benzodiazepine , zopiclone . But long-term use drug induce adverse reaction , include resistance , dependence addiction . Many article indicate electroacupuncture effectively improve insomnia , play role sedative hypnotic effect avoid many adverse reaction side effect . Then objective indicator affirm part brain take place appropriate change electroacupuncture induces sedative effect . So designed experiment .
